events.message: The candidate has submitted their application for the software engineer position, highlighting experience with Java and cloud technologies.
The application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster due to relevant keywords such as software and developer.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to the candidate to coordinate the next steps in the hiring process.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call with the candidate to assess fit and discuss their software development background.
The candidate responded enthusiastically to the initial screening and expressed strong interest in moving forward with the technical interview.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with the software engineering team to further evaluate coding skills.
